ModMetaData.name: CustomDeathRandomness
ModMetaData.author: Torann
ModMetaData.description:
Version 1.3 In vanilla RimWorld, human-like pawns that are not part of your colony have a chance to instantly die when downed. Animals have a 50% chance to die when downed.
This chance changes depending on the storyteller, current colony population, and difficulty.
This mod gives you options to tailor the death-on-down chance to your preference.
